title: Energy Efficiency Standards and Guidelines
sources: EU Energy Performance of Buildings Directive
key_principles: Energy consumption should be normalized by building area and occupancy
Building type significantly influences energy intensity benchmarks
Climate factors (heating/cooling degree days) affect energy consumption
Regular monitoring and benchmarking are essential for continuous improvement

school.occupancy_patterns: High during school hours, low during breaks

university.occupancy_patterns: Variable by semester, 24/7 in some areas

efficiency_classification.efficient: Meets or exceeds best practice benchmarks
efficiency_classification.moderately_efficient: Meets minimum standards, room for improvement
efficiency_classification.inefficient: Exceeds acceptable thresholds, requires immediate attention
